about_the_game:
"Premium Item Pack : 30% discount on the price of the adventure mode shop, 50% reduction in material requirements when crafting and strengthening at the blacksmith (minimum 1), various initial consumption, material items 10 each, 5000 gold.
Click the Receive button in Shop -> DLC in the game to receive the item."
detailed_description:
"Premium Item Pack : 30% discount on the price of the adventure mode shop, 50% reduction in material requirements when crafting and strengthening at the blacksmith (minimum 1), various initial consumption, material items 10 each, 5000 gold.
Click the Receive button in Shop -> DLC in the game to receive the item."
name: Game of Dragons - Premium Item Pack
